title: Topic 004 Question 019
body: You have an app named App1 that uses a custom Azure AI Document Intelligence model to recognize contract documents.
You need to ensure that the model supports an additional contract format. The solution must minimize development effort.
options: Lower the confidence score threshold of App1.
Create a new training set and add the additional contract format to the new training set. Create and train a new custom model.
Add the additional contract format to the existing training set. Retrain the model.
Lower the accuracy threshold of App1.
